title: Under His Heel: A Kidnapping
description: During what should have been a boring family affair, Alex is kidnapped while trying to protect Tracht’s nephew. With Tracht’s sister concentrating on getting her son back, nobody is thinking about Alex—except Tracht, who will stop at nothing to get him back.  This 20k short story continues the story of Alex and Tracht from "Under His Heel."
author: Adara Wolf
